resources.title: Seniors Mobility & Enabling Fund
resources.description: Financial assistance for mobility aids and home healthcare items to help seniors maintain independence and quality of life.

resources.title: Caregivers Training Grant
resources.description: Up to $200 per year for caregivers to attend approved training courses to better care for their loved ones.

resources.title: Home Caregiving Grant
resources.description: Monthly cash grant of $200 for families caring for seniors with permanent moderate disability at home.

resources.title: Foreign Domestic Worker Levy Concession
resources.description: Reduced levy rates for families hiring foreign domestic workers to care for seniors or persons with disabilities.

resources.title: Community Health Assist Scheme (CHAS)
resources.description: Subsidies for medical and dental care at participating clinics for seniors and their families.

resources.title: Silver Support Scheme
resources.description: Quarterly cash supplement for seniors aged 65 and above with lower lifetime wages and less family support.
